org.apache.river.test.spec.activation.util

Class FakeActivationSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.test.spec.activation.util.FakeActivationSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActivationSystem, Remote

    public class FakeActivationSystem
extends Object
implements ActivationSystem
    A fake implementation of the ActivationSystem abstract class for test purposes.
